SELECT
,p.pic_id AS "pictureId", CONCAT("118.126.94.107:8080",p.pic_path) AS "picPath", p.pic_type AS "picType", p.pic_status AS "picStatus", p.pic_name AS "picName"
,i.test_id AS "testInfoId", i.test_title AS "testTitle", i.test_subject AS "testSubject", i.test_pic AS "testPic", i.test_type AS "testType", i.pay_flag AS "payFlag", i.test_presentation AS "testPresentation", i.test_num AS "testNum", i.test_use_time AS "testUseTime", i.test_price AS "testPrice", i.test_preferential_price AS "testPreferentialPrice", i.test_report_length AS "testReportLength", i.test_prompt AS "testPrompt"
from xc_module AS a
left JOIN xc_picture AS p ON a.pic_id = p.pic_id
LEFT JOIN xc_test_info AS i ON a.test_id = i.test_id
a.module_status = #{moduleStatus}
and a.module_id = #{moduleId}
